home_page_about_text_1: 'Image-Textile' LLC, founded in 2010, is equipped with modern special and universal equipment that allows the production of special, uniform, household clothes, bed and table linen, and interior decoration products. The product range of the factory includes more than 100 working models of garments and is constantly updated. The sewing factory is equipped with JACK sewing machines.
footer_contact_address: Bukhara region, Ramitan district Landmark: 'Eshoni Pir' Jome Mosque.
about_page_text_1: «Image-Textile» LLC, founded in 2010, is equipped with modern special and universal equipment that allows the production of special, uniform, household clothes, bed and table linen, and interior decoration products. The product range of the factory includes more than 100 working models of garments and is constantly updated. The sewing factory is equipped with JACK sewing machines.
about_page_text_2: «Image-Textile» LLC includes a weaving factory, which is equipped with modern preparatory and weaving equipment. It is specially adapted for the production of cotton and mixed fabrics. We provide high quality fabrics and a variety of structures. At present, our weaving factory has: – European Picanol machines – Chinese machines “Dongjia JA60” - Russian machines 'STB-190' and 'STB-250' - Preparatory equipment — Benninger sizing machine - Warping machine 'Karl Mayer'. The factory is also equipped with an air conditioning and humidification system.
